title: Riot please fix banning
body: I am so frustrated with ranked queuing right now, I join a lobby, it becomes my turn to ban/pick champ and guess what? I click the champion icon that I want to ban/pick and what happens? Nothing... It is so dumb and riot really needs to fix this shit right now. Then after that I get kicked out of the lobby and have to wait another 20 minutes plus I loose my LP. Riot please fix this dumb stuff.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This sounds like it might be a connection issue on your end, could you please run through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) article and let me know if the issue persists.

I'd also recommend [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6), just to be sure that it's not your client causing the issues.
